short_description: RANDOM GIFT: Hands-free Umbrella Straps - This G4Free hiking umbrella comes with 2 shock cord straps randomly. You can attach the umbrella to the shoulder strap of your backpack to free your hands and sweat less rather than wear a raincoat. If it did not come with the kits, please feel free to contact us to get it.

Ultralight and Portable Only 9.5 Ounces - Fiberglass frame provides great strength and reduces weight. This hiking umbrella weighs only 9.5oz which is designed to lighten your load and protect you from the rain and sun.

UPF 50+ UV Protection Umbrella - The canopy is made of 100% polyester fabric. Titanium silver coating fabric reflects heat to cool you down, 50+ UPF rating to block 99% of the sun’s harmful UVA and UVB solar rays. G4Free umbrella keeps you cool in the sun and protect your skin.

Large Canopy & Collapsible - This full-size umbrella opens to 43" arc and 38" diameter, is slightly larger than other light trekking umbrellas, perfects for hiking, backpacking, and traveling. Also, it is collapsible to a small travel size for easy storage in backpacks and luggage. The reverse folding design can avoid wetting your backpacks.

Umbrellas Built to Last - The Ultimate Backpack Umbrella is constructed with a sturdy aluminum shaft. For the ribs and tips, we use fiberglass, which is flexible and durable. We stand behind the durability of our goods with strict craftsmanship and provide 12 months warranty on them.
